MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW10 postcode area of Middlewich affecting properties in Cledford Lane. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of damage to an underground cable and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible via generator by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:23AM on 11th January 2021.
